name.japanese: トビウオライダーズ本拠地

description: The headquarters of the Flying Fish Riders, led by Duval. A fortified compound where they hold captives and plan their kidnapping operations. The base is equipped with traps designed to capture intruders.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Duval's Base
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive to rescue Hatchan, unaware they are walking into Duval's trap.

keyEvents.title: Hatchan's Identity Revealed
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats discover that the captive is Hatchan, creating a moral dilemma.

keyEvents.title: Trap Activated
keyEvents.description: Duval activates the trap, surrounding the Straw Hats with Flying Fish Riders.

significantFeatures: Fortified compound with cages for holding captives
Base of operations for the Flying Fish Riders
